Key Match Events: Rishabh Pant hit five boundaries in eight balls
Hardik Pandya broke India free of their second lull and scored a fifty
Kuldeep Yadav derailed the Bangladesh chase with three wickets
Jasprit Bumrah played his part with 15 dots and two wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli as a partnership has won many a match for India, but at this T20 World Cup, they are yet to click
India are finding a new identity at this World Cup, four of the seven batters who went out there scored at a strike rate of 150 or more
Post-Match Reflections: India's win puts them in a strong position to qualify for the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2024
Bangladesh are on the brink of elimination after losing by 50 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch and the outfield were slow, which made it challenging for the batsmen to score runs
Tanzim Hasan was Bangladesh's best bowler and earned that mantle by being unpredictable
Rishad Hossain arrived at this T20 World Cup as Bangladesh's most exciting cricketer
